name: Modules.IsModuleLoaded
remarks: Checks if a module with the specified unique ID has been loaded (i.e., it's in the 'Modules' folder).

output.desc: true if the module is loaded, false otherwise

name: Modules.HasAssetByID
remarks: Checks if an asset with the specified unique ID has been loaded.

output.desc: true if the asset is loaded, false otherwise
